website_summaries.verdict: The fold-down style makes these tough boots stand out.
pros: The leather/nylon uppers are durable and attractive, and these work as well as a work boot as they do as a statement
These boots are warm, comfortable, and look great
Shaft measures 7 inches from the arch, and the heel is .75 inches high
cons: Some customers found these boots to be warmer than leather Dr. Martens

customer_reviews.title: Bad choice
customer_reviews.text: had shoes less than 5 months.. Bottom already split open.. wear out so fast .. not recommended !!
customer_reviews.author: Shabah

customer_reviews.title: 5/5 will keep buying
customer_reviews.text: Was loyal to the Sorel Woodbine, but when that style was discontinued and a solution was necessary, these have far surpassed expectation. Comfortable, durable and classically stylish... found a new boot to be loyal to.
customer_reviews.author: Hugh G

customer_reviews.title: Boot up !
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing these for about three months now, and I find them very comfortable . The downside to me is they are not polishable . The picture is misleading . But the upside is they are very easy to clean, with a clean rag and a little warm water. The tread on them bites into the terrain where I live very well. I live in the forest here in Northern Arizona, so I will see how they handle a snowy winter, and update accordingly. Thank you for a boot that is well constructed, and fits very well for a good price .
customer_reviews.author: Todd Sanger

customer_reviews.title: Great for summer months.
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots, they're comfortable and very breathable during the hot weather. My only negative is that you'll probably need an insole but that's not a deal breaker. Great alternative to leather when the heat is too high but you want to wear boots. They come with both black and yellow laces but I prefer the yellow ones.
customer_reviews.author: Paul D.

customer_reviews.title: Horrible creases appeared on them and do not look good at all!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great deal on this boots!!! I just put them on and as soon as I took a few steps a few HORRIBLE CREASES appeared on the boots. Not one one crease where it folds but a few all over the boot!!! How do I fix it?
customer_reviews.author: ish

customer_reviews.title: Not slip resistant, I do not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes for work because they were slip resistant or so it claims. I've been wearing them for a month and I must say they are the farthest thing from slip resistant shoes. Unfortunately it's too late to return. So I can't really wear them to work and they're not the type of shoes I would wear outside work. So basically I just wasted a lot of money. If you're buying these because they are slip resistant I do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: HoneyPoohBear

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, stylish, won't find a better boot for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Very little break in time needed. I wear a size 11 in my other Docs, went with 11 here. Perfect. Fits like a glove. One thing I did do, as others have noted, was replace the laces, which were horrible. Once that was done, voila! The perfect boot! Considering the price, and quality, may buy a 2nd pair. Wear them to work at the office, which is casual business. Look great with Docker's and cargo pants. Have not had a long time, so can't comment on the durability, but they seem well made and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: William E. Dahl

customer_reviews.title: Blister Makers
customer_reviews.text: The width and length is right but there's not enough room. You'd have to have really thin feet to wear these comfortably or go up a size and deal with long soles. The big problem is not really the sizing though it's not comfortable, but I could deal with it and they would wear in eventually. The big problem is the reinforcement in the heel. There is not padding so it pokes you through the material. I wouldn't recommend these, but there's still good dr.martens. I'm going to return these unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: Zach.M.ZM

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking shoes
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had a pair of Dr.Martens for quite some time and I wanted breathable boots. After reading the reviews and I really liked the look of these boots, I tried to figure out the size. I am a 10 in Vans and Nikes so as suggested, I went one size down and ordered a UK 9. Must say, they are still a bit too big but manageable. Love the look with jeans but also with some nice shorts. They are certainly a little stiff and will.need some break in time. Overall super happy with them
customer_reviews.author: mitsch

customer_reviews.title: A quality boot
customer_reviews.text: These are great boots. I bought these because my first pair has lasted me the better part of 3 years. And I wear them daily in a warehouse, in the shop, they have stood up to concrete, welding, grinding, oil, coolant, gasoline, lawn mowing, landscaping, etc. They really have been abused. And after 3 years, the only issues I have with the old pair is, they are faded, have paint on them, have a cut in the one toe section, and the sole has dried out and cracked, however still perfectly functional for the shop. I just wanted a nice new pair because I love these boots.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin March

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Poor seam welding at the base as brand new, my socks got wet when I was walking in puddles. Couple months in the bottom of one soles cracked in the middle of the foot arch area. The air-sealed bottom apparently doesn't make much difference as the shoe with the "air-cushion" and the shoe with the busted bottom both feel the same. Very stylish shoe so I wear em still anyway, just know these aren't a rugged brand anymore due to being cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: A tree frog

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and durable so far.
customer_reviews.text: These are by far the most comfortable footwear I've ever worn. They have been holding up well since I purchased 3-4 months ago. Mine are made in Vietnam, not England, but I have not had any quality issues with them. The fact is, even if they are not "old school" Doc Martens quality, for 60-65 bucks, you are going to be hard-pressed to find a better built boot. Most 60 dollar shoes are glued together and complete shit. These are great, especially the price. Plus, they're nylon, so the break-in was non-existent. These were comfortable from day one. I recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Ron B.

customer_reviews.title: Nearly perfect except one minor annoyance
customer_reviews.text: Just “almost” perfect! Nice materials and build, fairly wide (a plus) and looks rugged. The only “small” fly in the ointment is the very edge of the shoe (where leg is) needs a soft material stiched around the edge. Wearing shorter socks might chafe the legs at that spot. It did on my legs until I put longer socks on that covered my leg there and then, no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Go down a size (or two)
customer_reviews.text: First off awesome looking shoes! They are comfortable and feel of high quality, how ever i typically wear a 9.5US and down sized to a 9 as they dont sell half sizes. After trying them on they are still 1-2 sizes too big! I will be returning to try and get the correct size as other than that the shoes look awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Kaden Little

customer_reviews.title: You think with it being Nylon it would breath better. But honestly it's no different than my leather ...
customer_reviews.text: You think with it being Nylon it would breath better. But honestly it's no different than my leather boots. Don't go camping in these or walk in wet grass or wet weather in general. Water will go right through it (duh) but air seems to not??? For the price it aint bad, but just get the leather 1's unless you like the look. Also note that if you go camping in these, don't let anything hot for the fire touch it. it burns right through like it's toilet paper.
customer_reviews.author: The Sharp

customer_reviews.title: These were made for walking...
customer_reviews.text: ...and that's just what I did. For me I love Doc Martens, they're tough and comfortable. I use a pair for working outside and a pair for going out...they're multi-functional. The toe gets creases from wearing them but that's not a big deal for me. They're not guaranteed to make you run faster or jump higher...but they look cool as you run slower and jump lower.
customer_reviews.author: ADAM J. CANTU

customer_reviews.title: Vegan Docs rule
customer_reviews.text: Since giving up participating in the ugly business buying and selling of dead cow skin, I've (not surprisingly) had trouble finding boots I like in my size (14).... Very, very happy to find these. This canvas boot is very comfortable, and while it will obviously wear out a lot faster than a leather Doc, the trade-off (cruelty-free vs lasting for years) is well worth it to me.
customer_reviews.author: Lowell L.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Boots!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my fiance so he could finally get a pair of good boots that he could wear out in the winter on date night. I bought these hoping for the best and they exceeded both of our expectations. They fit like a glove - absolutely no break in time was needed. He is beyond happy with them and a Doc Martin fan going forward. By these and you won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: IndianaGirl

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: I was unsure of whether the nylon was going to work out but it definitely is a good choice. Not to mention there were half the price. Only thing I dislike is that I find them to be slippery, way more than expected. I use them for my server job and have to be careful when walking on a wet floor. They are definitely not slip proof just so you know. Other than that they are very comfortable and seems to be holding up exceptionally well
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Great fit,super comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I buy my son a pair of boots every year for his bday. While scrolling thru all the combat boots I came across these and sent him the link to look at them. He liked them,so I ordered them for him. At the end of the first week of wearing them he called me to tell me he loves them,said they were actually wide enough,and they had great support(back actually didn't hurt at end of day).
customer_reviews.author: molly c.

customer_reviews.title: Great sneaker/boot
customer_reviews.text: I waited a while to find a boot to wear besides my Wellington’s and I’m glad I stumbled upon these ones! First time I wore them is when we went to Disney and wore them every day!! I have two other pair of their boots and they are the only pairs of shoes I’ll ever wear till I die. Wish they had a steel toe version
customer_reviews.author: STAY  @  HOME  DAD

customer_reviews.title: Please READ!
customer_reviews.text: Great boots BUT.... I just put them on for about 1 hour and had ugly creases appeared on the boot. I read all of the reviews and seemed that some had an issue with this, but creases only after less than an hour of wear??? I love the look of the boots but I'm not thrilled about the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Alex S.

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Love them!! so comfortable it's my second pair I work as a greenhouse grower, I'm always walking miles and miles a day regular shoes or boots last 3 months top this ones last almost a year they look so cool and like I said before so comfortable and very light weight.
customer_reviews.author: alberto

customer_reviews.title: Buy. You wont regret it.
customer_reviews.text: Was hoping I'd like these. Turns out I love them. Came with bonus yellow laces which look dope. Been wearing them at work (courier) get compliments on them and even after a 12 hour shift, feel pretty good. Update: been 3 months and still going strong. Ordering another pair as the originals have been my work boots. The 2nd pair will just be for me.
customer_reviews.author: stacie

customer_reviews.title: Fit Great
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable boot. Im a US 12 and bought these as an 11 and fit perfect. I went to the store to try these on before I ordered and the size 12 was too large. The extra space would have likely caused blisters from the shoe sliding back and forth. Going down a size is not a rule for Dr. Martens. I tried on other Dr. Martens and the 11's were too tight. For some reason the COMBS NYLON were the only shoe model that required I go a size down.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: they hurt my feet
customer_reviews.text: I am trying to break these boots in...I have not had a pair of boots that hurt my feet so badly... I understand that it might take a week or two to break them in.. I cannot put them on my feet to work them in.. I have purchased in soles for them they don't work. They are going to make somebody when I donate them...
customer_reviews.author: Wutangjack

customer_reviews.title: Love the comfort of these boots
customer_reviews.text: These are comfortable boots for me. The bouncing soles feel good on my feet and I can wear these for long periods. This my 5th pair of these since I wanted different colors. The only con I have of these boots is they don't breath well so if you wear them everyday they tend to get smelly.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Witt

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected.
customer_reviews.text: Always been a fan of Matins but these are by far my favorite pair. The treads are nice and deep so they are good with the snow and the boots themselves are exactly the same as the leather ones just made of a different material. i got lucky and got them at a lower price so I have a very nice pair of boots. Also helps that they are slip resistant, great for work. just wish the slip resistance didnt wear down so fast.
customer_reviews.author: David Maxwell

customer_reviews.title: Dr. Martens Men's Combs Nylon Combat Boot
customer_reviews.text: One of my kids got me onto Dr. Martens. I am glad I purchased them and have purchased many pair. I wear them everyday and have no problems with them. I even wore them at a long day of work 13+ hours with 5 of them totally on my feet walking around on cement and I did not have any blisters or cramping of my feet. I did spray a waterproofing spray upon them and I think they did not bleed nor ruin the fabric. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Steev

customer_reviews.title: Included is a lifetime warranty card, made sure to fill out and send.
customer_reviews.text: These are a quality made boot known for its durability and style. Texture is unique in this design as its waterproof material. I'm a size 8 in men's normally a 9 in women's and true of size. Second eyelet from top lacing, proper socks and there's no rubbing on low calf.
customer_reviews.author: SiouxZeeQ

customer_reviews.title: Really like the looks
customer_reviews.text: I really like this boots The recommended number was 10 but that was big and 9 fits me perfect and I regularly use 9.5
customer_reviews.author: karlous

customer_reviews.title: All day comfort
customer_reviews.text: These Docs are perfect! They fit & feel great. I’m in an aircraft hangar on concrete flooring and they’re super comfortable all day. Being canvas / textile, they breathe enough that my feet stay dry!!! For me, that makes them better than leather uppers! Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Stoge

customer_reviews.title: More like a dress shoe in my opinion
customer_reviews.text: I love that it's flexible and true to it saying comfortable and it's very comfortable. But, and I say this with a heavy heart, it's not worth it if you work in construction. Especially roofing. I had to make a trip up there and with these shoes I almost fell off immediately if it wasn't for one of the roofers. And in the process the soles got caught on metal that was sharp and the soles couldn't hand it being it's not tough enough rubber treads. Sadly, I'll have to go back to wolverine shoes. 😑
customer_reviews.author: Bluethor

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love
customer_reviews.text: Im in love with these shoes so I bought them in three colors. They fit super comfortably. I always purchase the Combs style of these boots. They were delivered timely and the box was in great condition. The material is durable and good in all types of weather. Even in summer, they don't make your feet feel super hot. They are not heavy and they take any outfit up a notch. I would recommend these boots to anybody.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Not bad vs leather
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant about the durability of the nylon vs leather as I am used to, but while it has only been three weeks, I have ridden bicycles and motorcycles through sun and rain. I have put these through some many different scenarios and they have helt up quite well so far without fraying. Another concern was how quickly the sole would wear out, specifically near the heel as I tend to drag my feet a little bit (trying to stop) but they have barely wore away. I highly recommend these even if you are used to leather. They breathe quite well too. I am completely satisfied and will update this review over time.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Huynh

customer_reviews.title: Great for long days on your feet
customer_reviews.text: I work retail and am on my feet 8+hrs a day. These are comfy, warm, and sleek. I don’t have foot pain when at work anymore. And bc these are the synthetic Docs, there was no “break-in” period. Comfortable from the start. I’ll have to buy another pair whenever I’ve worn these ones out.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes for a Rainy Day!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because Dr. Martens' shoes are known for their durability, and they seem to hold up quite well. I usually wear them when the weather prohibits wearing more expensive sneakers. Many of my friends complimented me on them! I use some padded insoles with them, since I find Dr. Martens a little stiff and hard on my feet when standing or walking for extended periods of time. All-in-all, I highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Joel Livsey

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and durable
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots, they are so comfortable and they allow my feet to not get tired in a job where 30k steps a day is not uncommon. The build quality is great as well as the looks. By far the best set of work boots I own.
customer_reviews.author: Kona

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and the price is right.
customer_reviews.text: Great boots. Very little breaking in time. They hurt a little across the toes for the first few years, but much more comfortable than regular leather docs that take awhile to break in. I recommend these gladly. For $60, a great bargain.
customer_reviews.author: Dbag1972

customer_reviews.title: Nice boots
customer_reviews.text: Sizing runs small by about a size to size and a half American. Love the look and feel of these boots. Use them as a semi dress boot for wearing around town. Breath better than full leather.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Love em!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t recommend breaking these in with a long walk as you wouldn’t with any doc boot (longer socks to avoid blister city) but these are great! Digging the nylon texture, and they fit as expected! Getting them on sale for $50 was awesome too! If you are a half size like me the options are really personal preference. Down half a size if you want them snug and to form to your feet or up if you like wiggle room. Didn’t come with the yellow laces which I would’ve liked but that an argument for a Karen. Get these!
customer_reviews.author: G Fawkes

customer_reviews.title: Very good for price, add some h2o proofing spray and longer laces to your purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent summer boots, comfortable and quick to break in. Only complaint is that the laces included with the boots were flimsy and short, barely long enough to fully lace and the the boots. Purchased laces 12 inches longer, and applied a waterproofing spray, now I'm very satisfied with these boots. Several months in, I love these boots, upgraded to 5 stars. I may buy 5 more pairs and consider myself set for life, as warm weather footwear goes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Lightweight Boots
customer_reviews.text: The "Bouncing Soles" of these boots are great. I've recently started walking a lot more for work and these boots are better than any of the other pairs of shoes I have. They aren't as heavy as my waterproof snow boots, so they're perfect for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: cory klumper

customer_reviews.title: Unusable
customer_reviews.text: The nylon and color don't really mesh well with any outfits I've tried. They're just collecting dust now. Not very comfortable, and a pain to get on. Loosening the strings just pulls them out of the holes. Kind of a waste, and I can't return them.
customer_reviews.author: AJisOkay

customer_reviews.title: Best boots ever!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely should order a size smaller but this boots are the best I am on my third pair so far and it’s been a year but they have lasted me a long time I just like the new look and I wouldn’t wear them on concrete too much if you are looking to use the slip resistance because it wears off pretty easily but no biggie to me best boots ever and I get a lot of compliments and people Always ask me where I get them from I will be getting some more ps I lowkey needed to shave 😂 look bad but the fit is on
customer_reviews.author: Juan De Los Rios

customer_reviews.title: Perfect if you want Breathable Boot
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for breathable boots for riding season and these have met all my expectations. Boots/shoes never last long with me because I'm always rough on my feet but these have held up and great for those hot days on the Harley. Recommend if your looking for some breathable boots. If you want waterbooth boots do not get these. Other than that, sole grip and fitment is great. Along with comfort.
customer_reviews.author: W

customer_reviews.title: great boot
customer_reviews.text: These boots are great! They appeal to both my 52 year old husband and my 23 year old son. Sturdy build as expected from Dr. Martens. Arrived in quick time and in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Lorene H

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my boyfriend's birthday since he had a pair as a teen and loved them. He thought they were super comfortable and reminded him of his pair from the 90s. Even after over a year of use and daily wear for months at a time, they're still in great shape. No broken laces or run down soles!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer A. Eblin

customer_reviews.title: not original but still comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I wear size 11. 11 1/2. Depending on the shoe. I ordered a size 12 perfect. And I don't believe in any way that these are original docs. I've been wearing them every day for about 3 weeks and they're still very comfortable boot no matter where they're made.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Harris

customer_reviews.title: Not Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I've worn Docs for over 30 years. These by far, are the most uncomfortable pair. They are too stiff. Giving them the college try and hopefully, they will soften over time
customer_reviews.author: ToWolf

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for Christmas for my son...I had no idea they were canvas. It said “synthetic leather” so I assumed this was going to be some high quality polyurethane or something. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Holly H. Clem

customer_reviews.title: Just Nice
customer_reviews.text: Great look, great fit and good quality. Took my boots to an unexpectedly wet place in Mexico and I was surprised at how well they kept my feet dry. Not waterproof completely Iguess, but they were great with an amazing grip at the bottom. I do recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Weak fabric
customer_reviews.text: I like the fit of this boot, but after only a few months of moderate use hiking and doing construction, the fabric over the toe has worn through. I'll coat the holes with gorilla glue and eke out a few more months before tossing them out. Workboots should stand up better.
customer_reviews.author: customer

customer_reviews.title: Love em
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots! I get a lot of compliments when I wear them. Around the ankles has started to create little beady balls of nylon. Wish they were a little more durable. V stylish tho!
customer_reviews.author: Drew Egli

customer_reviews.title: Best boots
customer_reviews.text: I love them. I never had doc martens before. They're very comfortable, I've worn them all day and no pain whatsoever. I change the laces up depending on my outfit but the yellow are very nice and look amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Gómez

customer_reviews.title: They arent built to well.
customer_reviews.text: I wore these boots about 5 times total doing yard work. Nothing extreem and all and kept them clean. The yellow stitching on the sole came completely unraveled!’and its at the toe where i cant see or reach the inside to fix it myself. I hope they give me my money back or fix it for free because this is unacceptable!
customer_reviews.author: Clyde

customer_reviews.title: If you have bad joints or back get these.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because I have multiple injuries and the new sketchers I have been using were hurting alot. These have been great so far and I live in a rural area with uneven ground conditions just on my property and I have reduced the pain levels dramatically wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: So much lighter, but I worry about wear
customer_reviews.text: When I can avoid dirt and scuffing I wear these instead of my full leather steel toe DMs. But I have to avoid dirt and scraping the toes.
customer_reviews.author: Skeptical Viewer

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: I’ve wanted these for SOO long. These fit and look amazing although sometimes I’m an 8.5 and these as a 9 are too big. I have to wear thicker socks with them but I like them a lot. I love thE yellow laces good
customer_reviews.author: Garry

customer_reviews.title: Read this before you buy!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Once worn in they are very comfortable. If you are wearing them on tile they can become a bit slippery when dirty but when wet have pretty surprising grip. They are the lightest pair of boots I know own and almost feel like tennis shoes. The sizing is pretty exact I bought a 10 1/2 and fits really good. I’ve had them for about 3 months and is easily one of the Best Buy’s for price and quality... if you can look past them being pretty ugly from the ankle up.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Work boots
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes. Comfortable and fit perfectly. I've had them a couple of months now and I am hard on my boots. I can go through a couple pairs a year if they're cheap. These are nicely made and I feel will be lasting me a while. Good quality for the money spent.
customer_reviews.author: Mars13

customer_reviews.title: Not for wide feet
customer_reviews.text: They’re cute but not comfortable to work in at all.
customer_reviews.author: rose

customer_reviews.title: Great boots
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my husband and he loves them. He said they run a little big which most docs do. he wears a 10.5 and I got him a 10 so a 9 would have definitely been too small so I’d say if you’re a 10 order a 9 but if you’re a 10.5 10 is good.
customer_reviews.author: brittney

customer_reviews.title: Very lightweight yet very durable!
customer_reviews.text: These are very lightweight compared to original Dr Martens but are made just as well. Easy to clean. My husband has worn them now since Christmas and they still look brand new. I love them so much I'm getting myself a pair!
customer_reviews.author: Donna White

customer_reviews.title: Great boot
customer_reviews.text: These boots are light and won't slow you down. Certainly not the most protective and they don't breathe well, but I still wear them almost daily over a year later with very little visible wear.
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: Not leather Docs, but still great
customer_reviews.text: Doc Martens for sure! Not tight like leather Docs, really comfortable. Suggest a silicone spray to help waterproof it if wearing in wet areas.
customer_reviews.author: Omle57FNH

customer_reviews.title: Too small.
customer_reviews.text: Looked good but and were light but could barely get my foot in. Order 1 size larger as they don't come in half sizes although I don't know that a half size is enough.
customer_reviews.author: David M.

customer_reviews.title: Great boot, great price,, but will not last a year
customer_reviews.text: Great boot, great price, if you are used to leather boots, this material is a bit rough on the calfs for the first few uses, i dont tighten mine as much as leather. Easy on, easy off, i am the envy of my coworkers. UPDATE September of 2017, I use them 5 days a week. The sole split on one boot and now they are useless.
customer_reviews.author: Jose M. Villegas

customer_reviews.title: A good deal
customer_reviews.text: I had bought a pair of these doc comb boots for work. Once broken in they are by far the most comfortable and breathable work boot. The durability of these boots have been tested on construction jobs and roofs and have held up well. Not a steele toe,water proof or insulated for winter. Beware of where your buying as the 2nd pair i bought i was given the wrong size and the tags on the inside are different
customer_reviews.author: Blaine

customer_reviews.title: Look cool, but unfortunately fit like the rest of their boots
customer_reviews.text: They fit like other Docs. If that works for you, you are in luck. I found them too narrow in the forefoot and too loose in the heel. I was hoping the canvas material would be more forgiving and stretch to accommodate my width... This was not going to happen.
customer_reviews.author: TDG

customer_reviews.title: Comfortably wide fit.
customer_reviews.text: I usually wears 8 wide/2E but no need with these, the 8 D/M fits perfect. Very comfortable, as close to wearing sneakers as a pair of boots could be. i find it necesary to change the insoles on about 50% of new footwear i buy but the insoles on these are very comfortable and supportive.
customer_reviews.author: Bill P

customer_reviews.title: Awesome boots
customer_reviews.text: What can I say about these awesome boots but they are AWESOMENESS... They fit great and I went a size smaller then what I wear. I just hope they last a while like my last pair for Doc Martins did. I love doc martins and always have.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Williamson-Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my boyfriend for Christmas and he loved them! He is a 9 and I bought that exact size and they fit perfectly! 👍🏽
customer_reviews.author: Zazoma

customer_reviews.title: Terrible creasing after one hour
customer_reviews.text: Literally trash. Creased within one hour of wearing. No comfortable either even after a month. Get some REAL Doc Martin’s this design should be scrapped. It’s completely garbage. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Zoman

customer_reviews.title: Great boot for those willing to help over production of animals
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always had DMs and these are great except the soles are thin. I use these as work boots and walking over gravel can be painful. I know the just came out with another boot can’t wait
customer_reviews.author: Jason Bazzell

customer_reviews.title: Great for work
customer_reviews.text: I work in a deli but it's not all cheeses and meats. Often we must move heavy stock use pallets and there's a lot of hauling garbage chicken grease ect. These boots manage to stay clean and are durable SOBs. Though I would recommend the dr martens comfort insole or the happy step insole if you plan on using them for work. Overall great boots whether you're working or trying to be a punk rock young adult haha
customer_reviews.author: Muslim babe

customer_reviews.title: Doc Martens boots
customer_reviews.text: Totally LOVE my Dr Martens. Doesn't get much better. Some serious crating goes into this particular boots. Will last forever with little care. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Happy Hubby
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband for Christmas and he loves them! He is very picky when it comes to clothes and shoes but he was very happy with these. The only complaint he has is that it's more work to get in and out of them, but he isn't used to combat boots and is normally a shoe guy.
customer_reviews.author: Kimber

customer_reviews.title: Narrower Than Expected
customer_reviews.text: After a long time, I finally decided to get my own pair of Doc Martens, probably more for the name. The shoes look nice, but the ankle and mid-foot are too narrow, which makes the shoes hard to get into. They are, though, fairly comfortable and stylish. I read that it takes a few weeks or so to break them in, so I'll give them a chance before I think about returning them.
customer_reviews.author: yoshman

customer_reviews.title: True
customer_reviews.text: I have owned docs before so i know my size with them. If you dont know take a shot, but if u do these are true. Why i bought them off amazon cuz i know my size. Fit just like my last pair. Will buy again all day
customer_reviews.author: Axl

customer_reviews.title: Sizing does not run big! Ordered usual size and was too small!
customer_reviews.text: Well despite other reviews saying hi mess boots come large I ordered my usual size and they were way to tight. Pinched the top of my toes terribly. Toe box in these boots are way to shallow
customer_reviews.author: David Shirley

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad I found these and didn't have to spend $130. With the plantar fasciitis inner-soles I also bought on Amazon, I'm extremely happy. They're not leather boots so they're nice and light.
customer_reviews.author: jonathan the writer

customer_reviews.title: No yellow laces ☹
customer_reviews.text: I bought these hoping to get the yellow laces that all the reviews talk about... NOT !!! So if you're thinking about purchasing these and the yellow laces are a factor, you may want to ask Dr Martin before you do. Bummer !!
customer_reviews.author: Amber Day

customer_reviews.title: Fits as expected
customer_reviews.text: Looks good, fits as expected, lightweight, seems as if it will be easy to clean if need be
customer_reviews.author: gregory gedmin

customer_reviews.title: Happy Feet
customer_reviews.text: These turned out to be an excellent investment for the money. A good looking boot and quite comfortable and cool. Great boot for motorcycle riding and would definately order them again.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Vineyard

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BOOT INCREDIBLE PRICE
customer_reviews.text: Love love love these boots and a great! Price. The only reason I didn’t give 5 stars is because they fray at the edges on the top of boots. But other than that they are great boots and pretty water resistant as well being in Portland it constantly rains and they are good to go thru the rainy season.
customer_reviews.author: Regis

customer_reviews.title: Look great
customer_reviews.text: Very stylish, heavy duty. I love them. Very stiff will take a lot of time to break in. Run a tad small
customer_reviews.author: Dannyallyn

customer_reviews.title: I love these boots
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots. Don't really appreciate the creasing, but I found that that's just the case with almost every shoe these days. I've weatherproofed them, as well, and there wasn't any noticeable discoloration. Comfortable once you get used to them.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Koval

customer_reviews.title: Great Boots!!!
customer_reviews.text: These have been great for work. I went through three pairs of tennis shoes in the same amount of time I've been wearing these. I would buy another pair, but I don't see the day that I'll need to ever coming up.
customer_reviews.author: bdodgester

customer_reviews.title: They are ok.
customer_reviews.text: The boots look nice and have no apparent animal products, but I had to order a size and a half larger.
customer_reviews.author: Michael nettles

customer_reviews.title: Airy Docs
customer_reviews.text: I have been suffering from Docs that go bad after a year....must have been cheap leather that were used on their steel toed series, or I am getting really nasty and sweaty feet. So, a canvas version is nice and hopefully light enough for my feet to breath better. This is a very good looking shoe, but I did not get the yellow laces!
customer_reviews.author: Jason R Spooner

customer_reviews.title: Good investment
customer_reviews.text: Had to go to a 12 since the 13 came in too big. I usually wear a 13 in most of my shoes. Great boots! Light weight and durable. Easy to clean, too! Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: rhaspyhonker

customer_reviews.title: Buy this pair of boots for an excellent fit without the weight.
customer_reviews.text: This pair of boots instantly became a favorite. I will certainly buy another pair when these wear out. If I can find the right price I'll probably buy them before this pair wears out as an insurance plan. The service was excellent too. Anytime I can place an order and not have a single question or problem speaks to the excellent service of the company fulfilling the order.
customer_reviews.author: Robert timbario

customer_reviews.title: Order a half size smaller then you would regularly wear.
customer_reviews.text: There great boots. Their just too big. I'd like to exchange them for a 10.5 if possible?
customer_reviews.author: Willie

customer_reviews.title: Love my New Boots!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these boots as a costume item for a play, but once I tried them on I loved them!!! I am definitely wearing them after the play is over!!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff C.

customer_reviews.title: Believe it or not! !!
customer_reviews.text: I wear mine to work. I was asked to do a bit of landscaping the other day, and I had no choice but to dirty my docs, afterwards I decided to take a chance and throw them in the washing machine......then I air dried for a couple days. Guess what? They looked and smelled great!!!
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel G Millan

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great boots, just creases a little by the toe box but overall great quality and comfortable boot that looks good
customer_reviews.author: manbearphoenix

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, get an insole if you have high arches
customer_reviews.text: They fit great and are comfortable. Bought them for work at a restaurant and they've been great. The upper is easy to keep clean, I used a waterproofing wax on mine to add some water resistance. Only downside I've found so far is if you have high arches(like i do) you might want to look into an insole. Otherwise they're great.
customer_reviews.author: Aidan Benoy

customer_reviews.title: You're tearing my sole apart, stairs
customer_reviews.text: The sole degraded fast, splitting in multiple places. I bought these boots in the hopes they would be durable for all the stairs I climb at work, but the four giant tears deter me from wanting to suggest this boot.
customer_reviews.author: Cedric McLeod

customer_reviews.title: Laces!
customer_reviews.text: Laces that are with it must be for a kids shoe- didn’t even lace the whole boot up.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Ziolko

product_meta.title: Dr. Martens Men's Combs Nylon Combat Boot
feature_bullets: Classic doc dna: goodyear welted stitch, heel loop and grooved sides lightweight materials meet heavy duty construction in a fold-down boot that suits whatever terrain you traverse.
